info.title: DollarPe API
info.description: API for DollarPe - Customer, Payout, and Webhook services

get.description: Returns basic configuration for payout - supported fiats, supported assets, supported networks and live coin limits

errors.example: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

get.description: Fetch exchange rate for a given asset and network combination

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: The crypto asset for which quotation is requested

parameters.name: fiat
parameters.description: The fiat currency in which the quotation is requested

errors.example: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

post.description: Create a quotation for cryptocurrency to fiat conversion

bank_id.description: Customer's Bank's unique identifier in which the payout will be maid

client_reference_id.description: Optional client reference ID for tracking

errors.example: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

get.description: Fetch details of a specific payout

parameters.name: payout_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the payout

errors.example: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

parameters.name: payout_status
parameters.description: Filter payouts by status (e.g., SUCCESS, FAILED, PROCESSING)

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter payouts by customer ID

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter payouts created on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be used together with end_date.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter payouts created on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD). Must be used together with start_date.

example: start_date and end_date must be used together
